comment._content: Translation with adjustments: [The former] concentration camp Lunetten near Vught [in use] for the shelter of Ambonese

comment.author: 97068463@N00
comment._content:
Afgelopen zaterdag geweest in Vught, 60 jaar Kampong Lunetten. Zijn er misschien nog meer foto's?
Hoor graag!
